org.huahinframework.unit
Class JobDriver

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configured
      org.huahinframework.core.SimpleJobTool
          org.huahinframework.unit.JobDriver
All Implemented Interfaces:
Configurable, Tool
public abstract class JobDriver
extends org.huahinframework.core.SimpleJobTool

This is a test driver of a Job.

Example:

 public class JobTest extends JobDriver {
   private static final String LABELS = new String[] { "label", "value" };
   public void test()
       throws IOException, InstantiationException,
              IllegalAccessException, ClassNotFoundException {
     addJob(LABELS, StringUtil.TAB, false).setFilter(TestFilter.class)
                                          .setSummaizer(TestSummarizer.class);

     List input = new ArrayList();
     input.add("label\t1");
     input.add("label\t2");
     input.add("label\t3");

     List output = new ArrayList();
     Record record = new Record();
     record.addGrouping("label", "label");
     record.addValue("value", 6);
     output.add(record);

     run(input, output, true);
   }
 }

setSimpleJoin

protected void setSimpleJoin(String[] masterLabels,
                             String masterColumn,
                             String dataColumn,
                             List<String> masterData)
Easily supports the Join. To use the setSimpleJoin, you must be a size master data appear in the memory of the task.

Parameters:
masterLabels - label of master data
masterColumn - master column
dataColumn - data column
masterData - master data
